page.title: 09Our Thoughts Of Today
page.content: The Twentieth Century is the most weird century that I have ever heard of.There were two World Wars and a threat of another one now - a Nuclear War. Our Environment is lovely,mainly farm land,river,hills and woods.We still have trees but they are being cut down very rapidly.We have lazers,robots, calculators,digital watches and computers because we have the Silicon Chip. We think about the Children and People who suffer in disasters.We write prayers for the people in Ethiopia and collect money for them.We have just raised 100 pounds for Doctor BarnardoÂ£s Children. We also care about conserving our Environment - protecting wildlife , saving energy,stopping pollution,the destruction of trees,buildings and land
